headline.main: WAKE RAID CALLED PRELUDE IN ATTACK; Hawaii to Be 'Heart of Our Offensive' in Pacific, Says General Hale, Air Chief BIG BOMBERS 'HIT JACKPOT' ' Perfect' Combat Operation, as General Ramey Describes It, Caused Heavy Japanese Loss

lead_paragraph: HICKAM FIELD, Hawaii, Jan. 2 -- With Hawaiian air fields as the home bases for a far-ranging United States Army bomber force working in conjunction with the Navy, blows will be struck at Japan's central Pacific holdings for which the Wake Island raid the night of Dec. 23-24 was really a rehearsal, Major Gen. Willis H. Hale, commander of the Army's Seventh Air Force, said today.
abstract: Brig Gen Ramey on raid results
